Hello everyone. I'm really enjoying this game so far, but i cant figure out how to add a 3/4 launch stage. I probally just missed it in the tutorial but i'd relly like to know how to do it.

Also,is the anyway to simultaneously ignite engines? Thanks!

Hello everyone. I'm really enjoying this game so far, but i cant figure out how to add a 3/4 launch stage. I probally just missed it in the tutorial but i'd relly like to know how to do it.

Adding a decoupler, either a stack or radial, will add another stage. Also, if you're using the new experimental version, you can click the little plus sign next to the staging numbers on the right.

All engines in a stage will ignite at the same time so just make sure the engines you want to activate at the same time are in the same stage.

Oh, one other thing...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!
